text: Hagi Efraemi vahe'mota inankna hu'na tamatregahue? Inankna hu'na Isareli vahe'mota tamatregahue? Hagi inankna hu'na Adma kumate vahe'ma zamazeri havizama hu'noa zana hugahue? Hagi inankna hu'na Zeboimi kumate vahe'ma zamazeri havizama hu'noa zana hugahue? Nagra nagu'areti tusi'za hu'na nasunkura huramantoe.
